collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_description: Consists primarily of scripts for motion pictures (produced and unproduced), television, stage and radio, including The Armour Hour, 1933-1935, Joe Penner, 1937, National Biscuit Show, 1937, and The Ken Murray Show, 1937. Also includes personal papers and project files including treatments and story ideas written by Englund and his collaborators.
